overview: This special documents Mickey Mouse's historic two-week visit to the Soviet Union in 1988, honoring a Disney film festival in which three classic animated features were screened in the country for the first time. As the festival traveled through Moscow, Tallinn, and Leningrad, Mickey was given a tour the USSR by Misha, the USSR's mascot for the 1980 Olympics, and they encountered many interesting sights and people.
title: Mickey Goes to Moscow
